parsed.internal_thinking: As the first player to place, I want a high-yield location that provides a good mix of starting resources. Node 20 is an excellent choice, offering 12 total pips across three different resources: Brick (6), Sheep (8), and Wood (11). This variety is crucial for early road and settlement construction. While Node 43 has higher pips (13), it is heavily concentrated in Wheat, which could leave me resource-starved for expansion. Node 20 provides the best balance of probability and utility for my first settlement. [Response was too brief]
parsed.note_to_self: Placed first settlement on node 20. Looking for a high-yield Ore or Wheat spot for my second placement to balance the economy.
parsed.say_outloud: hey everyone! going to start things off by grabbing this spot with the 6 and 8. looks like a solid foundation.
